Class StaffRepository

java.lang.Object
repository.StaffRepository
public class StaffRepository extends Object
The StaffRepository class provides methods to manage staff records, including reading, saving, updating, and deleting staff data. Staff records are loaded from and saved to an Excel file. It handles both generic staff and doctor-specific staff (extending from the Staff class).

This repository class allows operations such as adding a new staff, deleting a staff by hospital ID, and retrieving lists of all staff or only doctors.

Since:
2024-11-15
Version:
1.0
Author:
CHARMAINE

  • Constructor Details

    • StaffRepository

      public StaffRepository() throws IOException
      Constructs a new StaffRepository object, loading staff data from the Excel file into memory.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while reading the staff data from the file.

  • Method Details

    • saveNewStaff

      public void saveNewStaff(Staff staffInfo) throws IOException
      Saves a new staff member to the repository and updates the staff Excel file.
      Parameters:
      staffInfo - The Staff object containing the information to be saved.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while writing the new staff data to the file.

    • deleteStaff

      public void deleteStaff(String hospitalId) throws IOException
      Deletes a staff member from the repository based on their hospital ID.
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - The hospital ID of the staff member to delete.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while deleting the staff or updating the file.

    • getAllStaff

      public List<Staff> getAllStaff()
      Returns the list of all staff members.
      Returns:
      A list of all Staff objects in the repository.

    • updateStaff

      public void updateStaff(Staff newStaffInfo) throws IOException
      Updates the information of an existing staff member.
      Parameters:
      newStaffInfo - The Staff object containing the updated staff information.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while updating the staff data and saving it.

    • getDoctorByHospitalId

      public Doctor getDoctorByHospitalId(String hospitalId) throws IOException
      Retrieves a Doctor by their hospital ID.
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - The hospital ID of the doctor to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Doctor object with the specified hospital ID, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while retrieving the doctor information.

    • getAllDoctors

      public List<String> getAllDoctors()
      Returns a list of all doctor IDs from the staff repository.
      Returns:
      A list of doctor IDs.
